|vendor_id = 050d |device_id = 845a |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = K7SF7D2101V1 |icid = 3623A-F7D2101V1 |boardid = 141752220009J |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 94:44:52

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/24/2010 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 777782079486 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B003CJTNL8 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Driver references two IDs - 050d:945a and 050d:845a.
"P/N: 141752220009J R0B" (?) is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :"P/N: 141752220009J R01" is silkscreened on a production model's board.
{{WiFiCert|WFA8471|01/19/2010}}
